reviewText: my grand kids love it & it helps teach good values
My son loves all of the animals in this episode. His favorite is the giraffe. He also loves the parrot that visits Mr. Perkins. He thinks it's so funny! Another great series!
My son loves this!!!  He loves the animals and even though these are oldies, they are goodies in his eyes.  He watches these daily.

I expected it to be with the giraffe on the cover as I doubted they would have multiple episodes with a giraffe.  I watched it by streaming with Amazon Prime so I wasn't bothered that it a repacking but if I bought the video, I would have been disappointed. My sons love it of course so I gave it a 4.

This is a collection of a few "Thomas & Friends" episodes involving animals. The kids at my house love Thomas, and they love animals. So the two together make this one of their favorite collections.
The HD streaming really is good. The picture and sound are excellent.
The kids really like watching this one, and ask for it at least every couple weeks, so I'm glad it's back on Prime streaming.
This item was as described.  I would recommend this to others.  Good for children three to five years old.  Lilke.
My kids ages 5 and 3 love this specific episode of Thomas. They have watched this over and over. Great movie!
Average Thomas video. Packaging was good
Don't like the episodes. I really expected more than six. Don't waste your money.
Our son is a fan of the Thomas & Friends series. This has a great storyline which engaged our two year old.
Super cute my son lives Thomas the train. Good show.
My daughter likes the vdeos, my son is a teenager and still likes Thomas the Train!
My twin boys are into trains lately and they love the CGI thomas series.
